facial_features.eyes: wide-set almond eyes with editorial intensity, dark espresso irises, naturally bold brows
facial_features.nose: elegant aquiline nose with refined bridge and defined tip
facial_features.lips: moderately full lips with defined edges and natural berry tone
facial_features.cheekbones: prominent angular cheekbones with dramatic shadow play
facial_features.jawline: defined oval face with stronger jawline and sculpted chin
facial_features.overall: striking editorial beauty with bold proportions, sophisticated refined features, runway-ready presence
